select server_version()
show mnodes
show dnodes
show dnodes

show databases;

panels.title: Number of DNodes for each Role

targets.sql: show connections
show databases;
show dnodes
show dnodes
show mnodes;
select  last(mem_taosd) as taosd, last(mem_total) as total  from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= now -5m and ts < now
select  last(cpu_taosd)  from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn'

panels.description: avg band speed  last  one minute

targets.sql: select avg(band_speed)  from log.dn where fqdn='$fqdn' and  ts >= now-5m and ts < now interval(1m)

panels.title: band speed

targets.sql: select last(io_read) as io_read, last(io_write) as io_write  from log.dn where fqdn='$fqdn' and ts >= now-1h and ts < now interval(1m)
select last(disk_used) as used  from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval(1m)
select last(disk_total) as total  from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval(1m)
select  max(mem_taosd) as taosd, max(mem_total) as total  from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= now -5m and ts < now

panels.title: Max Memory  Usage of taosd in Last 5 minute

targets.sql: select  max(cpu_taosd)  from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= now -5m and ts < now

panels.title: Max CPU  Usage of taosd in Last 5 minute

panels.description: avg band speed  last  one minute

targets.sql: select max(band_speed)  from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= now-1h

panels.title: Max band speed in last hour

targets.sql: select max(io_read) as io_read, max(io_write) as io_write  from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn'

panels.title: Max IO Rate in last hour

targets.sql: select sum(req_http) as req_http  from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= now - 1h interval(1m)
select sum(req_insert) as req_insert  from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= now - 1h interval(1m)
select sum(req_select) as req_select from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= now - 1h interval(1m)
select  avg(cpu_system) from log.dn where fqdn='$fqdn' and ts >= now-1h and ts < now  interval(30s)
select  avg(cpu_taosd) from log.dn where fqdn='$fqdn' and  ts >= now-1h and ts < now  interval(30s)
select  avg(mem_system) from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= now-1h and ts < now  interval(30s)
select  avg(mem_taosd) from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= now-1h and ts < now  interval(30s)
select  avg(mem_total) from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= now-1h and ts < now  interval(30s)
select avg(disk_used) from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval(30s)
select avg(disk_total) from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval(30s)
select avg(disk_used)/avg(disk_total) * 100 from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval(30s)
select derivative(value, 1m, 0) from (select avg(disk_used) as value from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval(1m))

panels.title: Disk Used Increasing Rate per Minute

panels.description: total  select  request  per minute last hour

targets.sql: select sum(req_select) from log.dn where  fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval(1m)
select sum(req_insert) from log.dn where  fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval(1m)
select sum(req_http) from log.dn where  fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval(1m)

panels.title: Requests Count per Minutes $fqdn

targets.sql: select  avg(io_read) from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= now-1h and ts < now  interval(1m)
select  avg(io_write) from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= now-1h and ts < now  interval(1m)
select  avg(io_read) from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= now-2h and ts < now - 1h interval(1m)
select  avg(io_write) from log.dn where fqdn = '$fqdn' and ts >= now-1h and ts < now  interval(1m)
select count(*) from log.log where ts >= $from and ts < $to interval (1m)
